alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 8:35PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alameda, north central San Mateo, south central Contra Costa and southeastern San Francisco Counties through 915 PM PST... At 835 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South San Francisco, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Hayward, Daly City, San Leandro, Alameda, Union City, Walnut Creek, South San Francisco, San Bruno, Burlingame, Lafayette, Millbrae, Castro Valley, San Lorenzo, Moraga, Piedmont, Cherryland, Fairview and Moraga Town. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
